subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Women
lead_paragraph: With the veteran mainstays Teresa Edwards, Yolanda Griffith and Dawn Staley gone, the Americans will be looking for new leaders while they try to qualify for the 2008 Olympics.
snippet: With the veteran mainstays Teresa Edwards, Yolanda Griffith and Dawn Staley gone, the Americans will be looking for new leaders while they try to qualify for the 2008 Olympics.
